data.message: Eminem , i hope you get this post or perhaps someone close to you will see it and tell you... I was moved and still am by your answer to the soldier who asked for you autograph , and you responded sure , if i can have yours " O.M.G.....that is the epitome of class my friend. Good for you for staying so grounded. You deserve all the succsess that comes your way. God bless you :):) paul mckenna
